Welcome to Lello’s

Fine dining from the north of Italy

At Lello’s we have brought authentic Italian cuisine all the way from Veneto to West Byfleet. Chef Alfonso and his team offer a regional selection of flavours from the North of Italy that is sure to excite the taste buds.

Take a look at our Menu

About Us

Our Food

From our Baccala' Venezia to our Paccheri Lobster Pasta you will be spoiled for choice. Or why not sample one of our Gourmet Pizzas? Our dough is made from Petra flour especially imported from Italy and then prepared and aged in our kitchen for 24 hours

Read More

Our Chef

Chef Alfonso hails from the North of Italy.

He has spent time as a Chef in some of the most famous kitchens around the world including Cipriani in both New York & Venice, before opening his own restaurant in his home town of Treviso.

Read More

Our Food

Created using the finest ingredients which are sourced from the relevant region of Italy, our dishes are all homemade and prepared on site.

Our Drinks

We offer a wide selection of everyday wine, alongside our distinguished selection of Premium Cellar wines. Artisan beer, cocktails and coffee complete our drinks offering sure to satisfy every occasion.
